context: Large-scale mining operation evaluating $50M investment in autonomous haul trucks and drilling equipment for underground operations

request.purpose: Autonomous mining equipment deployment including 20 haul trucks, 5 drill rigs, and supporting infrastructure
request.justification: Improve safety by removing workers from hazardous areas, increase productivity by 25%, reduce operational costs

decision_process.outcome: Significant safety improvements with 40% reduction in accident potential
Technology proven with successful pilot results
Manageable workforce transition with retraining commitments

business_impact.expected_outcome: 40% safety incident reduction, 25% productivity increase, 20% cost savings, enhanced operational efficiency

lessons_learned: Comprehensive workforce transition planning and pilot testing are essential for successful autonomous technology adoption
